item.description:
July 25, 2012 - 6:00 to 8:00 pm
6-8 Vine Hill Road. West Hartford, CT
>>Â Click Here to Register and Learn More

Two Family with Two Exit Strategies

Join CT REIA Coaching Member Mark Valenti of Business Investment Group Inc as he shows you how he acquired, financed, and fixed this 2-family house in West Hartford. Learn about his contractors and discover if he stayed within budget.

And now that it is completed, find out how Mark plans to market and sell this property. If it doesn't sell at the price he wants? Mark will share with you his SECOND exit strategy.

Invite your investment team and family to see how rehab is done right here in Connecticut.

Bring your clipboard to take notes and your business cards for networking. Light refreshments will be served.

group.name: CT REIA - The Connecticut Real Estate Investors Assn. Meetup

item.name: Connecticut Real Estate Rehab Meeting
